response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Considering its significance to you, I propose a price of $1,200,000 to make this opportunity more accessible. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be acquiring not just an object, but a symbol of prestige and unparalleled craftsmanship. Let's embark on a journey of mutual benefit and satisfaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
